trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando um serviço que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>classe encontra uma exceção não pode tratar, ele pode chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>método para informar o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho para gerar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O serviço passa <xref:System.Guid>instância do fluxo de trabalho e <xref:System.Exception>associado ao evento na chamada de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho encapsula esses parâmetros em um ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs e gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: De dentro de um assinante para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>eventos, você pode ler o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A>propriedade para obter as informações associadas a um determinado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exceção que não pôde ser tratada pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>que representa a exceção que não pôde ser tratada pelo serviço.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho associada à exceção sem tratamento.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstanceId is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstanceId é equivalente ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>da instância do fluxo de trabalho associada com o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho associada à exceção sem tratamento.</xref:System.Guid>
